messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Making a classic kinko tsuba
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Brian; I had the pleasure to meet this gentlemen and handle this tsuba last year in Tokyo. He is a wonderful artist and does exceptional work. John ...
messages.messageBody:
Hi Brian;

I had the pleasure to meet this gentlemen and handle this tsuba last year in Tokyo.

He is a wonderful artist and does exceptional work.

John



----- Original Message -----
From: sigp210
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, December 20, 2010 9:01 AM
Subject: [nihontostudy] Making a classic kinko tsuba



Just cross posting this for those who might not have seen it yet. It really is worth a view for anyone with an interest in this art.
Well done to Ford, and looking forward to the next few projects like this one.

Brian

Part 1 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wGMj7o6AwnM
Part 2 - http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pM0VnL30rDc





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
